channel.title: Database migration on Jamie's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Database migration on Jamie's Blog

item.title: Liquibase
item.description: Simple introduction Liquibase is open source tool for database change and deployment management. provides a database agnostic way to deliver fast, safe, repeatable database deployments, more details please refer to Liquibase website Support more than 10 databases, like Mysql, Oracle, SQL Server,DB2,etc.
